title: I Need to Skip Out on this Marriage - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai
tags: Acting   Amnesia   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Familial Love   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Manipulative Characters   Strong Love Interests
author: A Lifetime Of Beautiful Clothes   一世华裳
description: This is a story of a runaway bride who reincarnated, only to find that he couldn’t endure living with his fiancé and ran away from marriage again. A noisy, troublesome, clamorous love story.>
